summary: Architected and developed 'ITC Hub', a comprehensive internal management platform, demonstrating enterprise-level system design.
description: Led the end-to-end development of 'ITC Hub', a complex internal platform designed to streamline club operations. Acting as both Lead Architect and Full Stack Developer, I designed a scalable relational database schema using Prisma and PostgreSQL, implemented secure Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) with NextAuth.js, and built a responsive, type-safe frontend with Next.js and TypeScript. This project showcased my ability to handle the entire software lifecycle, from system architecture and database design to deployment and UI implementation.
projects: ITC Hub - Internal communication and management platform

summary: Developing a comprehensive Agricultural Management System for the National Office of Agricultural Development.
description: Algis is a comprehensive Agricultural Management System designed for the National Office of Agricultural Development (Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development). It digitizes and streamlines management of Agricultural Production Units (UAPs) across Algeria, centralizing scattered Excel data into a relational database with role-based access control, livestock tracking, equipment management, and production analytics. Uses PostgreSQL for hosted versions and SQLite for local development.
